          <title>
            <string language="fr">Coupe transversale de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Cross-section through the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitt durch die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cross-section através da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione trasversale attraverso la terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατομή μέσω της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sección representativa a través de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une coupe transversale de la terre, exposant le noyau, le magma, et la croûte.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a cross-section of the Earth, exposing the core, magma, and crust.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau</string>
            <string language="en">core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Querschnitt der Masse
und stellt den Kern, das Magma und die Kruste heraus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um cross-section da 
terra, expondo o núcleo, o magma, e a crosta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una sezione 
trasversale della terra, esponente il nucleo, il magma e la crosta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια διατομή της γης, που 
εκθέτει τον πυρήνα, το μάγμα, και την κρούστα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una sección 
representativa de la tierra, exponiendo la base, el magma, y la 
corteza.</string>
          </description>
